1100110101100111 1000110101010110 1 -> sum: 0101101010111110, cout: 1
0101001111010101 0100111000011110 0 -> sum: 1010000111110011, cout: 0
1010010110100111 0010001000101010 0 -> sum: 1100011111010001, cout: 0
0100011010101011 0010000011010010 1 -> sum: 0110011101111110, cout: 0
1100100110111101 1011101100010101 1 -> sum: 1000010011010011, cout: 1
1001110001100101 1001111001001111 1 -> sum: 0011101010110101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
